snippet: Prime Minister Matteo Renzi on Wednesday announced a $14 billion package of tax cuts and other measures intended to stimulate Italy’s stagnant economy.
abstract: Italian Prime Min Matteo Renzi announces a $14 billion package of tax cuts and other measures intended to stimulate country's stagnant economy, invest in public education and create jobs, especially for young people.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and GAIA PIANIGIANI

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Matteo Renzi on Wednesday announced a $14 billion package of tax cuts and other measures intended to stimulate Italy’s stagnant economy.

headline.main: Italian Leader Offers Plan to Fix Economy
headline.print_headline: Italian Leader Offers Plan to Fix Economy
